name: Tetris FPS (Demo)
description:
Tetris FPS innovates on what the world believes to be Tetris. Tetris FPS is a short first person shooter where you have the ability to slow time and shoot controlled bullets. You must defeat various Tetris pieces in order to learn the truth. 

This game is a demo and currently only has 2 main enemies to defeat.
